title: Drag and Drop
description: Create interactive drag and drop questions with draggable elements and drop zones.
author: H5P

semantics.name: title
semantics.label: Title
semantics.description: Title for the drag and drop activity

semantics.name: description
semantics.label: Description
semantics.description: Description of the drag and drop activity
semantics.default: Drag the items to their correct positions

semantics.name: instructions
semantics.label: Instructions
semantics.default: Drag the items from the left to their correct positions on the right.

semantics.name: draggableItems
semantics.label: Draggable Items
semantics.description: Add items that can be dragged

fields.name: text
fields.label: Item Text
fields.description: Text to display on the draggable item

fields.name: correctDropZone
fields.label: Correct Drop Zone
fields.description: The drop zone number where this item should be placed (1, 2, 3, etc.)

semantics.name: dropZones
semantics.label: Drop Zones
semantics.description: Add drop zones where items can be placed

fields.name: description
fields.label: Zone Description
fields.description: Description or hint for this drop zone

semantics.name: showFeedback
semantics.label: Show Feedback
semantics.description: Show feedback when items are dropped

semantics.name: allowRetry
semantics.label: Allow Retry
semantics.description: Allow users to retry after completing
